sections.title: 1. What Are Cookies
content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website.
They help websites function properly, improve user experience, and provide analytics data.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Cookies
content: - Ensure the proper functioning of the Website.
- Analyze how visitors use the Website to improve performance and usability.
- Remember your preferences for future visits.

sections.title: 3. Types of Cookies We Use
content: - Essential cookies: required for basic site functionality.
- Performance cookies: collect anonymous data on how visitors use the Website.
- Functionality cookies: remember user preferences and settings.

sections.title: 4. Third-Party Cookies
content: We may use third-party services (e.g., analytics tools) that set their own cookies to help us understand Website usage and improve services.

sections.title: 5. Managing Cookies
content: You can control or disable cookies through your browser settings.
Please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of the Website.

sections.title: 6. Updates to Cookies Policy
content: We may update this Cookies Policy from time to time.
The latest version will always be available on the Website.
